amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-5 to clarify the eligibility of any IRS employee for the pay increase.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarified the eligibility of any IRS employee for a pay increase of 2.6 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 183 (Roll no. 62).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Trahan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 183 (Roll no. 62).
